info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 6:27PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON...SOUTHERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN BELMONT...OHIO AND BROOKE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EST... At 626 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cadiz, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, Cadiz, Wellsburg, West Liberty, Wintersville, Mingo Junction, Follansbee, Hooverson Heights, Tiltonsville, Yorkville, and Bethany. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
